title: Band Fragment, 5th–7th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Weft; Z-spun linen, Z-spun wool.
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.
description: Nude figure standing with crossed legs and a lion in a medallion.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band Fragment, 5th–7th century.
5th–7th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Weft; Z-spun linen, Z-spun wool.
